dict.string: Here you can either switch to a new user or create new user
Here you can either open an existing account or create a new account
Here you can add people to the account, see who is affiliated to the accounts and chat with the people that are included in account
Here appears the list of all entries in the accounts. You can tap an entry and view an image attached to the posting
Here you can tap to see the current accounting or see a list of all completed accounting
Here you can see the current accounting or see a list of all completed accounting
Here you can take a picture of your receipt or of the thing you bought
When you press this button, you close the view and returns to the entry list
When you press this button you upload the posting, and you have the option to add a new
When you press this button, you create a new account
